definitions:
(intransitive, or transitive with de) to laugh (to express mirth or derision by emitting chuckling sounds)

Passei horas rindo.

I spent hours laughing.


Rimos muito daquele filme.

We laughed a lot at that film.

(transitive with de) to laugh at; to make fun of (to make an object of ridicule)

As pessoas apontam e riem de mim.

People point and laugh at me.

(intransitive, poetic) to laugh (to be or appear mirthful)

O dia ri.

The day laughs.
description: rir (first-person singular present indicative rio, past participle rido)
etymology: From Old Portuguese riir, from Latin rīdēre, present active infinitive of rīdeō (“I laugh”).
